definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
distributed denial of service (DDOS) form of Internet attack
pinyin: fen1 bu4 shi4 ju4 jue2 fu2 wu4

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 远程搜索服务器是一个单点故障点。

sentences.english: Our service is free repairs due to a series of bar code barriers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的服务是免费维修条码机出现一系列的障碍问题。

sentences.english: With BladeSystem, server organization is not tied to function.
sentences.chinese: 随着刀片服务器组织无关的功能。

sentences.english: But sometimes, ISP's and mail service businesses have no interest in righting what went wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有时，互联网的业务和邮件服务没有兴趣纠正想歪。

sentences.english: Fuan lift truck is premium quality, one year guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 富立安堆高机优质服务，保固一年。

sentences.english: Medical service contract is a kind of contract for commission.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务合同具有委托合同的基本属性。

sentences.english: All his life, Dr Huang served the people.
sentences.chinese: 黄医生为人民服务了一辈子。

sentences.english: Are new products and services being offered that were not a part of the old site?
sentences.chinese: 还是提供的新产品和服务不属于旧的网站的一部分？

sentences.english: Sends the encrypted session key to the server.
sentences.chinese: 将加密的会话密钥发送给服务器。

sentences.english: Nutrition for Foodservice and Culinary Professionals, Study Guide, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 食品服务和厨房专家所需营养，研究指导，第六版。

sentences.english: Why should the wind do his bidding? The wind is just wind.
sentences.chinese: 为什么风要为他服务呢？，风就是风。

sentences.english: This pizza parlor offers free delivery on weeknights.
sentences.chinese: 披萨店在工作日夜晚提供免费外送服务。

sentences.english: Mr. Kallasvuo said maps and navigation will be at the heart of the company's connection services.
sentences.chinese: 康培凯说，地图和导航将是公司连接服务的核心。

sentences.english: This approach leads to misalignment between the business goals and the developed services.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法将导致业务目标和所开发的服务间的不一致。

sentences.english: Please return the form, duly completed and signed, to our Public Office.
sentences.chinese: 请于填妥及签署表格后将其交回卓佳投资者服务处。
我们的电子服务才是关键。
